mapper.select: select id, code, platform_type, name, status, parent_id, order_num from t_role inner join ( select role_id from t_role_menu where menu_id = #{menuID} ) role_menu on t_role.id = role_menu.role_id

select id, code, platform_type, name, status, parent_id, order_num from t_role inner join ( select role_id from t_role_permission where permission_id = #{permID} ) role_permission on t_role.id = role_permission.role_id
